text: Deenei laa, Au go Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, go di God o Israel, gaa dugu anga gi hongo digau Judah mo Jerusalem nia hagaduadua huogodoo ala guu lawa dagu hagababa. Au e hai di mee deenei, idimaa i goodou ala hagalee e hagalongo gi agu helekai, gei goodou hogi hagalee e goou mai gi di Au i dagu gahigahi adu goodou.”
